meanings.sent1: I will redact the article to make it shorter.
meanings.sent2: The editor will redact the document before printing it.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked me to redact my essay to fit the word limit.
meanings.sent4: She carefully redacted the unnecessary details from the report.
meanings.sent5: He had to redact the email to ensure it was appropriate for all readers.

meanings.definition: Prepare for publication by obscuring or removing sensitive information.
meanings.sent1: The government agency will redact the classified information.
meanings.sent2: Before releasing the document, they need to redact personal details.
meanings.sent3: I had to redact the confidential data to protect privacy.
meanings.sent4: She decided to redact the names to maintain anonymity.
meanings.sent5: It is crucial to redact any sensitive content before sharing the file.
